## Styles type

Emotion `CSSObject` or `SerializedStyles` (or array containing them).

**Signature:**

```typescript
type Styles = SerializedStyles | CSSObject | Array<SerializedStyles | CSSObject>;
```

## Remarks

Useful to allow style utility functions to accept `CSSObject` directly with type safety and IntelliSense.

This should only be used for functions that accept styles and return `SerializedStyles` â€” not for raw values passed to the `css` prop. If we pass an object or array to the `css` prop directly the styles will be serialized on each render (rather than serialized once when the module loads).
